title: Microsoft Links 2003 Golf
description:
Microsoft Links 2003 Golf
=========================

So many places to find courses but not the original game!
So I bought it.

For all you retro gamers out there, this is the original Microsoft Links 2003 Golf disks (not the Xplosive version) with a NoCD crack that works.

Unrar the game (all 3 disks). Burn to CD's or mount via Daemon tools or similar utility and install it.
I've installed this via Daemon Tools and run it with no problems at all.

For NoCD: Unrar the NoCD rar file and copy the RuKsHuK.exe over the top of the original installed file.

Enjoy!!


PS: Unlike other rar torrents out there, this rar file is NOT password protected!
